author: @Lawns-Are-Fun
text:
Isn‚Äôt this guy just spouting Trotskyism? Revolution everywhere rather than ‚Äúrevolution‚Äù in one place? I dunno, tough to listen to someone who thinks they know better than Marx.

Edit. Also, I‚Äôve known engineers and even doctors who are really not too intelligent outside of their field of expertise‚ÄîI don‚Äôt think I agree with his elevation of these professions. Frankly, on a personal level, this guy‚Äôs personality seems extremely off putting. Even if he has something to say, it‚Äôs hard to listen to him because he seems so arrogant. He can barely have a conversation without just cutting people off and talking over them.

Still think Bridget is great. Thanks for your continued hard work! It‚Äôs good to bring on people even if I disagree with them and can see the flaws in their analysis.

author: @frededward6176
text:
The term is "from the BOTTOM up" not "Bottoms up". Botoms up Is an informal toast to empty you glass/bottle or shot.
This really isn't complicated, or shouldn't be, for the guy who insists so many others don't reach his intellectual excellence.
Grassroots movements are described as from the bottom up, leaderless/limited uniting actions.

replies.author: @Lawns-Are-Fun
replies.text:
You don‚Äôt have to be a jerk about it. I don‚Äôt agree with this guy but we don‚Äôt always have to have an echo chamber. If‚Äôs fine to hear opinions you don‚Äôt agree with.

Also, did you look at the comments ‚Äî everyone is just saying the guy is a Trot and seems like a jerk. So what‚Äôs the harm‚Äînobody seems convinced.

replies.author: @jeremywingard7043
replies.text: @ You think I was being a jerk? That was pretty tame of you ask me but whatever. Anyways I don‚Äôt agree with the guy either and I have know idea if he is a trot or not. But claiming he is from the video is just as bad as the right calling the Democratic Party Marxist. It‚Äôs reactionary.

replies.author: @Lawns-Are-Fun
replies.text:
@jeremywingard7043Yes yes we‚Äôre all reactionary fascists or whatever sure. But if you had listened to the video, he said things that are very indicative of someone who holds Trotsyist beliefs (e.g ‚Äúrevolution everywhere all at the same time not in one country at a time‚Äù). I didn‚Äôt just say it for no reason and I‚Äôm sure neither did the rest of the people who commented.

And yes, your response was clearly intended to be obnoxious‚Äî as you included several crying laughing emojis and said ‚Äúcope‚Äù. I understand for a person like you this might seem tame, as I‚Äôm sure you‚Äôre used to reacting even more juvenile in most instances. So I don‚Äôt know why you would be surprised that I would say you sound like a jerk. But, you clearly have antisocial tendencies so it‚Äôs not worth my time. Good luck.
